TEXT.TITLE: AUSTRALIAN TREASURY NOTE TENDER 200 MLN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: The Reserve Bank said it would offer for tender 200 mln dlrs of 13-week treasury notes next week. The Bank added it would take up 300 mln dlrs of 13-week notes at the average yield. The bank will not offer any 26-week notes for tender next week. REUTER
